import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { get, remove } from '../api/call-api'; function Shopsingle(props) { const {id} = useParams(); const history = useHistory(); const [product, setProduct] = useState("") useEffect(() => { get(id).then(response =>setProduct(response.data) ) }, []) //delete product const onDelete = (id) =>{ remove(id); props.onDelete(id) history.push("/shop"); } return (
{/* Modal */} {/* Open Content */}
{/* col end */}

{product.name}

${product.price}

  • Brand:

  • Easy Wear

Description:

{product.description}

Edit
{/* Close Content */}
); } export default Shopsingle;
